story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Both of you seem to be gearing up nicely for the
upcoming tournament!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_0700_10: Have you finished your training regimen on Pasio?
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_1100_10:
He trains tirelessly and is just as strong as I am
when it comes to Pokémon battling!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_1300_10:
They are famous dragon masters from Blackthorn
City in Johto.
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Their names are Lance and Clair! Lance is a
Champion and Clair is a Gym Leader.
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_1500_10: Huh, cool! No wonder they smell tough!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_1600_10:
How about it, Benga? Do you want to spar,
perhaps?
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_1800_10:
I’m curious to see what you’re capable of—
especially if Alder acknowledges your skills.
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_2200_10: I know that Trainer’s strong! And I want to battle!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_2300_10: But that Pokémon hasn’t been through enough!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_2400_10: Huh?! How dare you say that, you cheeky little—
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_2600_10: Hey! Why are you impressed with him?
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_2700_10: Well, if you’re not going to do anything about it...
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_2800_10: then I’ll teach this kid a lesson myself!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_2900_10:
Nope, you’re not good either! You haven’t been
through enough!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_3100_10: I don’t believe it. There must be some mistake...
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_3300_10: Hahaha! Looks like you’re not all talk!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_3400_10: You’ve got potential to become a Champion!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_3600_10:
That’s why I’m saying you haven’t been
through enough!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_3800_10: You only see me as a challenger.
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_3900_10:
You’re acting like you’re superior to me—as if I
wasn’t your equal!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_4000_10:
Benga, he’s a Champion. A person in his position
is expected to provide guidance to—
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_4100_10:
I don’t care about what you adults think you have
to do!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_4200_10:
Is it more important than wanting to beat
strong Trainers?!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_4300_10:
That woman is out to win! She wants it way more
than you do!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_4400_10:
Your Dragonite hasn’t been through enough, and
that’s such a waste!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_4500_10: Beating an opponent like that isn’t fun at all!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_4900_10: Do you want to beat me?
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_5300_10:
(I was very happy to witness my challengers
surpass me.)
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_5400_10:
(But maybe that means I’m starting to forget what
it feels like to WANT to win.)
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_5500_10:
There are still plenty of worthy foes we want to
beat here on Pasio.
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_5600_10: Thank you for opening my eyes, Benga.
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_5700_10: I don’t want to lose against anyone.
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_5800_10:
So I’ll make sure both Dragonite and I go
through enough!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_5900_10: Yeah! That better be a promise!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_6000_10:
We’re gonna compete with each other at the
tournament! And there we’ll see who’s stronger!
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_6100_10:
(Sync stones ultimate and the upcoming tournament
have stirred up a lot of excitement...)
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_6200_10:
(I have a feeling we’ll be seeing a new kind of
potential between people and Pokémon.)
story_stone_10_01000/2401_1201_6300_10: (It’s time for me to step up my efforts!)
